section.title: Manage navigation nodes
section.para: If you are the portal administrator or granted the appropriate permission privileges by the portal administrator, you can execute some special actions related to portal nodes, including copying, editing, cutting, cloning, deleting, adding existing nodes. To do so, you first need to go to the nodes list by following steps described in the Edit navigation section, then right-clicking your desired node to open the drop-down menu.

step.para: Select Add New Node to create a node as a sub-node of the selected node.

section.title: Edit a node
section.para: This function is used to edit the node settings and reselect a page for a node.

step.para: Select Edit this Node from the drop-down menu to open the form with all similar fields when you add a new node.
Change values in fields of the current node, except the Node Name.
Click Save to complete your changes.

section.title: Copy/Paste a node
section.para: These functions are used to reproduce a node in another place.

step.para: Select Copy Node from the drop-down menu.
Right-click the position you want to paste this node and select Paste Node.
Click Save to accept your changes.

note.para: Two same node names in the same place are NOT allowed.

section.title: Clone a node
section.para: The Clone Node function allows you to copy a node. The difference between cloning and copying a node is that the cloned node has its own page with the same content as the selected node. Therefore, there will be a new page that has the same name as the cloned node's page shown in the pages list when you access the Pages Management page.

step.para: Select Clone Node from the drop-down menu.
Right-click the position that you want to paste this node and select Paste Node.
The cloned node will be reproduced in a new place.
Click Save to accept your changes.

section.title: Cut a node
section.para: This function enables you to change the position of a specific node, such as changing the page path.

step.para: Select Cut Node from the drop-down menu.
Select the position that you want to paste this node, then click Paste Node.
Click Save to accept your change.
The cut node will be moved to your newly selected place.

note.para: Two same node names in the same place are not allowed.

section.title: Delete a node
section.para: This function is used to remove a node linking to a page. After the node has been removed, the page has been still existing.

step.para: Select Delete Node from the drop-down menu.
Click OK in the confirmation message to accept your deletion.
Click Save to accept your change.

section.title: Change nodes order
section.para: You can easily move the position of nodes up or down in the navigation bar following these steps:

step.para: Select Move Up or Move Down from the drop-down menu.
Click Save to accept your changes.
